title: Purdue Foundry invests $75000 in three high-tech, Purdue-related startups - Purdue University
content: Purdue Foundry invests $75000 in three high-tech, Purdue-related startups  Purdue University
description: Three Indiana-based, high-tech startup companies with connections to Purdue University each received $25,000 at the conclusion of Purdue Foundry's Boost accelerator.
